meanings: [명사] (자연유산) miscarriage, stillbirth, (인공유산) abortion [동사] (자연적으로) miscarry, have[suffer] a miscarriage, (수술을 통해) abort, have an abortion

vlive.korean: 천년의 유산? Cultural Heritage of 1000 Years? 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
